sentences.en: 'But it isn't perfume.'I said.'It's hair gel.'
sentences.cn: “ 不,这不是香水, ” 我说, “ 是发胶. ”

sentences.en: Ampholytes are electrophoresed through the gel prior to sample addition.
sentences.cn: 在加入样品前,两性电解质先通过凝胶电泳.

sentences.en: Bi 4 ? xLaxTi 3 O 12 ( BLT ) thin films were prepared on p - Si substrates by using sol - gel method at low temperature.
sentences.cn: 采用sol-gel工艺低温制备了Si基Bi4? xLaxTi3O12 ( BLT ) 铁电薄膜.

sentences.en: Gel formation requires hooking various chains together.
sentences.cn: 凝胶的形成需要把不同的链钩链在一起.

sentences.en: Hair Shampoo, Hair Gel Cream, Aftershave Liquid Soap, Cologne Deodorant, Cosmetic Accessories.
sentences.cn: 采购产品头发香波, 发胶奶油, 擦面液液体肥皂, 科隆防臭剂,化妆辅助部件.

sentences.en: My ideas are beginning to gel.
Several primary methods of depositing YBCO are emphasized, such as PLD, LPE, CSD and sol - gel.
sentences.cn: 着重介绍了YBCO超导 涂层的几种主要制备方法, 即脉冲激光沉积法(PLD) 、 液相外延法(IPE) 、 化学溶液沉积法(CSD) 、溶胶 - 凝胶法(sol-gel )等.

sentences.en: shower gel containing plant extracts that have a stimulating effect on the skin
sentences.cn: 含有对皮肤有益的植物精华的沐浴凝胶

sentences.en: Smear some aloe vera gel on the blister and cover it with a bandage to help it heal.
sentences.cn: 在水泡上涂一些芦荟凝胶并用绷带包起来以帮助它恢复到健康状态。

sentences.en: Soaps Bubble Bath, Shower Gel, Shampoo, Body Lotion, Gift Sets, Bathroom Accessories.
sentences.cn: 采购产品肥皂泡沫浴缸, 淋浴房,凝胶剂, 洗发水, 身体洗剂, 礼品套装, 浴室配件.

sentences.en: Spirochetes and organisms that show gliding movement can move over or through an agar gel.
sentences.cn: 螺旋体和其他滑动的生物能在琼脂表面或里面滑行.

sentences.en: The next phase of testing will assess the gel's effectiveness against STDs in humans.
sentences.cn: 下一步是做人体皮肤试验,从而确定这种凝胶的效能.

sentences.en: There were signs on Saturday that the team is starting to gel at last.
sentences.cn: 周六有迹象表明这支队伍终于开始团结作战了。

sentences.en: This gel gives a beautiful shine to the hair.
sentences.cn: 这种发胶会使头发看上去有亮丽的光泽。

sentences.en: VRLA battery has two kinds of technology: AGM ( absorptive glass - microfibre ) and GEL technology.
sentences.cn: VRLA电池有两类技术: AGM技术和GEL技术.

sentences.en: We would want to put an antiretroviral agent in the gel, to act as another level of protection, " he says.
sentences.cn: “我们希望在这种凝胶中放入一种抗逆转录病毒制剂，从而起到另一层的保护作用。” 他说。

sentences.en: When an aqueous solution of the protein gelation is cooled, a polyer gel is formed.
sentences.cn: 蛋白质明胶水溶液冷却时形成聚合体凝胶.

trans.tran_en: a thick wet substance that is used in beauty or cleaning products
if a liquid gels, it becomes firmer or thicker
